did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Robert B. McKersie Files, 1965-1978
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Collection of magazines, reports, letters, and correspondence.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Management, Emeritus, Sloan School of Management, Massachusetts Institute of Technology

Robert McKersie is professor emeritus of management at the MIT Sloan School of Management, where he has been since 1980. Prior to his time at MIT, he served as dean of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations at Cornell University, and as a faculty member of the Graduate School of Business at the University of Chicago. McKersie has served on several presidential commissions at the national level, is a member of the National Academy of Arbitrators, and was president of the National Industrial Relations Research Association (now the Labor and Employment Relations Association). He is the author of numerous articles relating to human resources, industrial relations, and operations management.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations --Administration.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Robert B. McKersie Files #/4033. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
